BBC Sport experts make predictions As the Champions League returns on Tuesday, BBC Sport experts predict their winners, which English team will go furthest, a surprise package and most exciting player to watch. items.ja: What is meldonium and can it enhance a footballer's performance?
items.en: What is meldonium and can it enhance a footballer's performance?
items.text_for_match: What is meldonium and can it enhance a footballer's performance? Meldonium use has led to significant bans for several prominent athletes. Meldonium use has led to significant bans for several prominent athletes.

items.ja: Vardy makes Cremonese debut in draw with Verona
items.en: Vardy makes Cremonese debut in draw with Verona
items.text_for_match: Vardy makes Cremonese debut in draw with Verona Former England and Leicester City forward Jamie Vardy makes his debut for new club Cremonese but fails to score in a goalless draw. Former England and Leicester City forward Jamie Vardy makes his debut for new club Cremonese but fails to score in a goalless draw.
